alert.note: Alert for Outagamie; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 12:43AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Winnebago, eastern Waushara, south central Waupaca and southwestern Outagamie Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1243 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fremont to 8 miles northeast of Napowan Scout Camp to near Redgranite. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fremont around 100 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lake Poygan and Rush Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
